DataElementConcept.preferredName: Gingiva Surgical Procedure Patient Self-Report Prior Osteonecrosis of Jaw Performed
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to having had surgical procedure of the mucoue membrane-covered tissue fo the jaws that surrounds the bases of the teeth prior to self-reported area of necrotic bone in the mandible or maxilla.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: The mucous membrane-covered tissue of the jaws that surrounds the bases of the teeth.:Used for operative procedures on organs, regions, or tissues in the treatment of diseases, including tissue section by lasers. It excludes transplantation, for which "transplantation" is used.

Concepts.definition: The soft tissue surrounding the neck of individual teeth as well as covering the alveolar bone. The tissue is fibrous and continuous with the periodontal ligament and mucosal covering.

A diagnostic or treatment procedure performed by manual and/or instrumental means, often involving an incision and the removal or replacement of a diseased organ or tissue; of or relating to or involving or used in surgery or requiring or amenable to treatment by surgery.

Property.preferredName: Patient Self-Report Prior Osteonecrosis of Jaw Performed
Property.preferredDefinition: Subjective reports made by the patient:Earlier in time or order.:An area of necrotic bone in the mandible or maxilla.:Performed; carried out.

Concepts.definition: Subjective reports made by a patient.
An area of necrotic bone in the mandible or maxilla.
Executed and carried through to completion.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: the free text field related to therapy.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).
